channel.title: Help hard short
channel.description:
ok how do iadd commands i got my server up and running and everything but now i want to add commands like ::fish how do u do this and stuff
also i want to put on the server again on the server stat page but it wont let me says one post only but the psot isnt on what do i do to be able to get server back on it ?

item.title: Help hard short
item.dc:creator: @samuraiblood2 samuraiblood2
item.description:
@samuraiblood2 wrote:

command are very very very easy to add and are pointless in my opinion (mainly because it takes the fun out of doing the server) just add somthing like this under public void customCommand(String command)

if (command.startsWith("Command Name")) { sendMessage("Your message here"); // This sends a message when the command is typed, you can delete this if you want addItem(item id, item amount); // This adds a item you can add as many as you want // below teles you to somewhere teleportToX = x coords; teleportToY = y coords; } you can make a command only be used by a serten person or a serten rights by doing this if (command.startsWith("Command Name") && playerRights >= 2) { // Anyone with rights higher then 2 can use this command for making it for a serten person do this if (command.startsWith("Command Name") && playerName.startsWith("The persons username")) {

Read full topic
